mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve mobile layout for better navigation and readability on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and reduce the number of HTTP requests to improve loading time.
seoOptimizationTip: Add more keyword-rich content and meta descriptions to improve search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Enhance visual appeal and interactivity on the homepage to increase user engagement.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking process by reducing the number of steps to complete a reservation.
tips: Consider integrating a live chat feature for customer support.
Ensure that the website is fully optimized for all major mobile devices.
